name: Atomical Haze
description: Atomical Haze is an 80/20 sativa-dominant strain bred by Paradise Seeds. A cross between Haze, an Indian sativa, and Sweet Afghan, you will first notice the smell and taste of kiwi and finish off with that classic spicy Haze flavor. A long-lasting buzz will having you feeling motivated and ready for what the day brings. These resin-caked buds will be ready for harvest in about 9 weeks and are ideal for indoor gardens.
descriptionPlain: Atomical Haze is an 80/20 sativa-dominant strain bred by Paradise Seeds. A cross between Haze, an Indian sativa, and Sweet Afghan, you will first notice the smell and taste of kiwi and finish off with that classic spicy Haze flavor. A long-lasting buzz will having you feeling motivated and ready for what the day brings. These resin-caked buds will be ready for harvest in about 9 weeks and are ideal for indoor gardens.

highlightedReviews.text:
Atomic Haze
Looks: Got a half of this, the buds were beautiful. Knobby sativa foxtails all over with pink hairs and lots of white crystals. The foxtails have a rainbow coloration to them almost,even though they are predominantly green.
Smell/Taste: The smell and taste a fairly light,but sweet fruity and pungent at the same time,very smooth. Nothing you will complain about
Effects: The looks draw you in, but the effecta keep you. A verry positive and happy cerebral high comes over you, no energy rush like typical haze strains, a very blissful calmness takes you over. You can chill, go out, or sleep with this one, very versatile.i can feel pressure on my eyes , almost a headband feel.
Definetly worth a try, the high is very unique, the buds are beautiful even if the taste is on par withtodays strains.
Loving this. It's got a fresh taste and uplifts you. Perfect anxiety strain.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: C3PO, Blucifer, Electric Kool Aid, Blue Mountain Fire, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The Leafly strain database was just updated with some new cannabis varieties! Still riding that high from Star Wars: The Force Awakens? Consider checking out the high-CBD hybrid dubbed C3PO. More of a Total Recall fan? We got a strain for that, too: Kuato. Those and many others have been added, and you can find out if they're available near you by checking the links below. Happy strain hunting!
 
   1. C3PO

Named after the eloquent and fussy droid from a galaxy far, far away, C3PO is a sativa-dominant hybrid strain cultivated in Humboldt County, California by Petrolia Farms. With the smell of fresh pine, C3PO delivers relaxing effects with mental clarity due to its high CBD content which usually falls between 13-15%. Minimal amounts of THC (less than 1%) mean this strain won’t cause the intense cerebral euphoria typically associated with high-THC varieties. Because of its CBD:THC ratio, medical patients might turn to this strain for treating pain, anxiety, and inflammation, among other symptoms and conditions.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying C3PO
 
   2. Blue Mountain Fire

A sativa strain with Jamaican roots, Blue Mountain Fire is an invigorating, upbeat variety that coerces creativity and happy mindsets. When grown outdoors, Blue Mountain Fire can tower with impressive heights and yields. Its high-energy buzz is perfect for motivating the mind and fighting fatigue, but those prone to anxiety may feel overwhelmed by the fast-paced euphoria this sativa has to offer. 

 
   3. Electric Kool Aid

Electric Kool Aid is a 60/40 sativa-dominant hybrid strain bred by crossing Purple Diesel and Cherry Pie. Preferred for daytime use, Electric Kool Aid provides uplifting effects that inspire the mind while easing the body into a relaxed state. Hashy notes of sweet lavender and grape flavor the sparkling crystal-covered buds, which can take on a stunning periwinkle blue coloration. 

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Electric Kool Aid
 
   4. Ace Killer OG

Ace Killer OG is an indica strain that boasts a high THC content and a pungent diesel aroma. Bred from White Fire OG, King’s Kush, Kosher Kush, and a mystery strain, Ace Killer OG inherits a heavy blanket of snow-like resin and hard-hitting effects that can stupefy even the most seasoned veteran.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Ace Killer OG
 
   5. Blucifer

Created in 2013 by Terraform Genetics who crossed Conspiracy Kush and Blue Dream, Blucifer is a blue-ish purple sativa strain that radiates with the smell of blueberries and cream with a spicy finish. These frosty buds are meant to leave you feeling productive and motivated, making it a perfect choice for inspiring that long-overdue nature walk. Blucifer works well in indoor gardens with minimal direct sunlight, and it should finish flowering in 55 to 60 days.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Blucifer
 
   6. Kuato

“Open your mind” with this hybrid strain named for everyone’s favorite alien baby. Bred by Terraform Genetics, Kuato’s resin-coated buds release a strong spicy aroma with an orange zest. This cross between Alien Orange Cookie and Blucifer takes after its ancestor Blue Dream, boasting an energetic body buzz and uplifted cerebral experience. A great plant for growers of all levels, expect high yields of dense, frosty flowers in around 50 days.

 
   7. Atomical Haze

Atomical Haze is an 80/20 sativa-dominant strain bred by Paradise Seeds. A cross between Haze, an Indian sativa, and Sweet Afghan, you will first notice the smell and taste of kiwi and finish off with that classic spicy Haze flavor. A long-lasting buzz will having you feeling motivated and ready for what the day brings. These resin-caked buds will be ready for harvest in about 9 weeks and are ideal for indoor gardens.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Atomical Haze
 
Browse through our other new strains that were recently added to the Leafly Explorer, or check out last week's newest additions!
